SEARCH
Module com.marinescu.fxmoney
Package com.marinescu.fxmoney.Interfaces

Interface LoanInterface

All Superinterfaces:
ShowBalance
All Known Subinterfaces:
UpdateTables
All Known Implementing Classes:
DataSource, LoanInfo, LoanSummary, MainApplication, PDFHolder
public interface LoanInterface extends ShowBalance
This interface contains methods for finding information about a loan.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • showMonthsDifference

      default int showMonthsDifference(String sDate, String eDate)
      This method shows the number of months between two dates.
      Parameters:
      sDate - The first date.
      eDate - The second date.
      Returns:
      The number of months.

    • getRemainingBalance

      default double getRemainingBalance(double remainingBalance, double payment)
      This method calculates the new remaining balance after a payment.
      Parameters:
      remainingBalance - The old remaining balance.
      payment - The new payment.
      Returns:
      The new remaining balance.

    • getEMI

      default double getEMI(double principal, int loanTermMonths)
      This method calculates the EMI (Equated Monthly Instalment). EMI represents a predetermined fixed payment that borrowers make to lenders on a specific date each month.
      Parameters:
      principal - The loan amount.
      loanTermMonths - The number of months for repayment.
      Returns:
      The EMI.

    • dueDate

      default String dueDate(String date, String loanDate)
      This method calculates the next due date for payment.
      Parameters:
      date - The current date.
      loanDate - The date when loan has approved.
      Returns:
      The next due date.

    • formatDate

      default LocalDate formatDate(String date)
      The method returns a date in the specified format.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to be formatted.
      Returns:
      The formatted date.

    • dateBetween

      default boolean dateBetween(String startDate, String endDate, String targetDate)
      This method determines if a date is between two dates.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date.
      endDate - The end date.
      targetDate - The target date.
      Returns:
      True if the target date is between the start date and the end date, otherwise false.
